definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: PCP can make one nearly impervious to pain at high doses.
sentences.chinese: 在高劑量的情況下，PCP可以讓人失去痛感。

sentences.english: They were then given a 20-point scale to use to rate their pain after each shock.
sentences.chinese: 她們將感受到的痛感運用20分滿分的方式進行區隔。

sentences.english: The economic crisis has intensified the pain from all these burdens.
sentences.chinese: 而經濟危機本身加重了這些負擔帶來的痛感。

sentences.english: They could also be important to genes related to pain sensation.
sentences.chinese: 它們對於與疼痛感相關的基因可能同樣重要。

sentences.english: Every time I drink a cup of coffee, Doctor, I have a stabbing pain in my right eye.
sentences.chinese: 醫生，每次我喝咖啡，我的右眼都有刺痛感。

sentences.english: Several studies (discussed above) have documented humor's ability to reduce pain in many patients.
sentences.chinese: 多項研究中都記錄了幽默能夠減輕病人的疼痛感。

sentences.english: If animals feel more pain than plants, we should eat less animals.
sentences.chinese: 如果動物的痛感比植物強烈，我們應該少喫肉。

sentences.english: My skin pricks when I get too hot.
sentences.chinese: 我太熱時皮膚有刺痛感。

sentences.english: He deplored the rigidity of her views.
The seizures face without pain, when general not with neck and body twitch.
sentences.chinese: 抽搐發作時面部一般無痛感，不伴頸部及肢體的抽搐。

sentences.english: This amplification leads to more intense pain and more severe depressive symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 這種誇大會帶來更強的疼痛感以及更嚴重的抑鬱症狀。

sentences.english: Cluster headaches cause severe throbbing pain on one side of the face around the eye.
sentences.chinese: 集束性頭痛可在患者的一隻眼附近引起強烈的悸痛感。

sentences.english: Third, existence paraesthesia , to aching feeling quite slow and so on.
sentences.chinese: 存在感覺異常，對疼痛感比較遲鈍等。

sentences.english: Delicate skin may experience a brief tingling sensation.
sentences.chinese: 嬌嫩的皮膚可能會有暫短的刺痛感。

sentences.english: A marked increase in aches and pains may reflect depression.
sentences.chinese: 疼痛感的明顯增強可能是抑鬱症的反應。

sentences.english: The tingling feeling in your mouth means the disease is working.
sentences.chinese: 你嘴裏的刺痛感標誌着疾病正在發作。

definition: to sneak in/to infiltrate/to be piercingly painful/to be unbearable (of pain, itch etc)
stab of pain/sting/fig. stimulus to action/a prick
